ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: i think you can train in any language at your guild once you have been exposed to it. for example i bet you spent some time in blackburrow before you went and
ygData.messageBody:
i think you can train in any language at your guild once you have been
exposed to it. for example i bet you spent some time in blackburrow before
you went and checked. and now you can train in gnoll.
-----Original Message-----
From: kalekona@... <kalekona@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 12:47 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Languages


>From: <kalekona@...>
>
>Rangers are not the only class to get Gnoll.
>
>My Dark Elf Necromancer received Gnoll from the guildmaster
>at a certain level.
>I still think that it is a set level that you receive
>certain languages at all.
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Got an opinion?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
Please keep the emails on topic.
>
